price: Sema: Hakika Mola wangu Mlezi humkunjulia riziki na humdhikisha amtakaye. Lakini watu wengi hawajui.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie: Hakika aliye niumba humkunjulia riziki amtakaye, katika wanao muasi na wanao mt'ii. Na humdhikisha amtakaye. Wala hiyo si dalili ya kuwa Yeye yuradhi na mtu au anamchukia. Lakini watu wengi hawajui haya.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
